device.deviceconfig:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <settings> <setting-files>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### Phonebook & Firmware Settings ###--> <!--########################################################-->
</setting-files> <phone-settings e="2">
<!--########################################################--> <!--### Audio Settings ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!--# Codec Order --> <codec_priority_list idx="1">%%codec1%%,%%codec2%%,%%codec3%%,telephone-event</codec_priority_list> <!--# Codec Size --> <codec_size idx="1">20</codec_size> <!--# sRTP Setting URS--> <user_srtp idx="1">off</user_srtp> <!--# DTMF Method --> <user_dtmf_info idx="1">off</user_dtmf_info> <!--# Full SDP Answer --> <user_full_sdp_answer idx="1">on</user_full_sdp_answer>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### Static 3CX Phone System Server Settings ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!--# SIP Server Name --> <srv_sip_server_alias idx="1">3CX PBX</srv_sip_server_alias> <!--# Show name on HS --> <srv_sip_show_ext_name_in_hs idx="1">on</srv_sip_show_ext_name_in_hs> <!--# Allow HS BT --> <srv_sip_enable_blind_transfer idx="1">on</srv_sip_enable_blind_transfer> <!--# Transport --> <srv_sip_transport idx="1">udp</srv_sip_transport> <!--# sRTP Setting SRV--> <srv_srtp_auth idx="1">off</srv_srtp_auth>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### Location 3CX Phone System Server Settings ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!--######################### LAN #########################--> {IF network=LOCALLAN} <!--# IP Adress of the 3CX PhoneSystem to register to (SIP) #--> <user_host idx="1">%%pbx_ip%%:%%param::sipport%%</user_host>
<!--# Local SIP Port for the phone (SIP) #--> <sip_use_different_ports>off</sip_use_different_ports> <network_id_port>5060</network_id_port>
<!--# Audio Default Port Range (SDP/RTP) #--> <rtp_port_start>49152</rtp_port_start> <rtp_port_end>65534</rtp_port_end>
<!--# STUN Server Default Sertting #--> <stun_server idx="1"></stun_server> <stun_binding_interval idx="1">90</stun_binding_interval> <keepalive_interval idx="1">off</keepalive_interval> <srv_sip_ua_data_server_nat_adaption idx="1">off</srv_sip_ua_data_server_nat_adaption>
<!--# SPM Default Sertting #--> <user_outbound idx="1">%%pbx_ip%%:%%param::sipport%%</user_outbound>
<!--# Provisioning Update Link #--> <setting_server>%%PROVLINKLOCAL%%/cfg{mac}</setting_server>
<!--# Registraion and Subscribtion timerouts/renewal #--> <user_expiry idx="1">120</user_expiry>
<!--# Rport and Received handing for invalid NAT configuration #--> <enable_rport_rfc3581>on</enable_rport_rfc3581> {ENDIF}
<!--######################### STUN #########################--> {IF network=REMOTESTUN} <!--# IP Adress of the 3CX PhoneSystem to register to (SIP) #--> <!--# The "user_host" field contains the ip address and SIP port of the SIP Registrar and Proxy - in this case 3CXPS. The "pbx_ip" and "param::sipport" variables will be replaced by the IP Address and SIP Port of 3CXPS.--> <user_host idx="1">%%pbx_ip%%:%%param::sipport%%</user_host>
<!--# Local SIP Port for the phone (SIP) #--> <!--# The "network_id_port" field specifies the phone's listening SIP Port. By default this field is left blank so the phone can select a port at random.--> <sip_use_different_ports>off</sip_use_different_ports> <network_id_port>%%phonesipport%%</network_id_port>
<!--# Audio Default Port Range (SDP/RTP) #--> <rtp_port_start>%%rtp_port_min%%</rtp_port_start> <rtp_port_end>%%rtp_port_max%%</rtp_port_end>
<!--# STUN Server Default Sertting #--> <stun_server idx="1">%%pbx_ip%%:%%param::sipport%%</stun_server> <stun_binding_interval idx="1">90</stun_binding_interval> <keepalive_interval idx="1">on</keepalive_interval> <srv_sip_ua_data_server_nat_adaption idx="1">on</srv_sip_ua_data_server_nat_adaption>
<!--# SPM Default Sertting #--> <user_outbound idx="1">%%pbx_ip%%:%%param::sipport%%</user_outbound>
<!--# Provisioning Update Link #--> <setting_server>%%PROVLINK%%/cfg{mac}</setting_server>
<!--# Registraion and Subscribtion timerouts/renewal #--> <user_expiry idx="1">120</user_expiry>
<!--# Rport and Received handing for invalid NAT configuration #--> <enable_rport_rfc3581>on</enable_rport_rfc3581> {ENDIF}
<!--######################### SBC #########################--> {IF network=SBC} <!--# IP Adress of the 3CX PhoneSystem to register to (SIP) #--> <!--# The "user_host" field contains the ip address and SIP port of the SIP Registrar and Proxy - in this case 3CXPS. The "pbx_ip" and "param::sipport" variables will be replaced by the IP Address and SIP Port of 3CXPS.--> <user_host idx="1">%%param::PBXPUBLICIP%%:%%param::sipport%%</user_host>
<!--# Local SIP Port for the phone (SIP) #--> <!--# The "network_id_port" field specifies the phone's listening SIP Port. By default this field is left blank so the phone can select a port at random.--> <sip_use_different_ports>off</sip_use_different_ports> <network_id_port>5060</network_id_port>
<!--# Audio Default Port Range (SDP/RTP) #--> <rtp_port_start>49152</rtp_port_start> <rtp_port_end>65534</rtp_port_end>
<!--# STUN Server Default Sertting #--> <stun_server idx="1"></stun_server> <stun_binding_interval idx="1">90</stun_binding_interval> <keepalive_interval idx="1">off</keepalive_interval> <srv_sip_ua_data_server_nat_adaption idx="1">off</srv_sip_ua_data_server_nat_adaption>
<!--# SPM Default Sertting #--> <user_outbound idx="1">%%local_sbc_ip%%:%%local_sbc_port%%</user_outbound>
<!--# Provisioning Update Link #--> <setting_server>%%PROVLINK%%/cfg{mac}</setting_server>
<!--# Registraion and Subscribtion timerouts/renewal #--> <user_expiry idx="1">120</user_expiry>
<!--# Rport and Received handing for invalid NAT configuration #--> <enable_rport_rfc3581>on</enable_rport_rfc3581> {ENDIF}
<!--########################################################--> <!--### Security Settings ###--> <!--########################################################--> <http_user>admin</http_user> <!--# Will not be set as multi home device #--> <http_pass>%%DEVICE_PASSWORD%%</http_pass>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### PhoneBook Settings ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<phonebook_server_location>0</phonebook_server_location> <phonebook_reload_time>1800</phonebook_reload_time>
{IF network=LOCALLAN} <phonebook_location>%%PROVLINKLOCAL%%/</phonebook_location> <phonebook_filename>snom_phonebook.xml</phonebook_filename> {ELSE} <phonebook_location>%%PROVLINK%%/</phonebook_location> <phonebook_filename>snom_phonebook.xml</phonebook_filename> {ENDIF}
<!--########################################################--> <!--### Time and Tone Settings ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<ntp_server>%%param::time_ntp_server%%</ntp_server> <ntp_refresh_timer>3600</ntp_refresh_timer> <!-- Tone Schema, valid options are: AUS,AUT,CHN,DNK,FRA,GER,GBR,IND,ITA,JPN,MEX,NLD,NOR,NZL,ESP,SWE,SWI,USA --> <tone_scheme>%%toneset.tone%%</tone_scheme> <timezone_by_country_region>off</timezone_by_country_region> <timezone>%%timezone%%</timezone> <language perm="">%%langauge%%</language> <web_language perm="">%%langauge%%</web_language>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### Firmware Update ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<firmware-settings> <firmware>http://dect.snom.com/</firmware> <fp_fwu_sw_version>400</fp_fwu_sw_version> <fp_fwu_branch_version>2</fp_fwu_branch_version> <pp_fwu_sw_version type=M65>400</pp_fwu_sw_version> <pp_fwu_branch_version type=M65>2</pp_fwu_branch_version> <pp_fwu_sw_version type=M85>400</pp_fwu_sw_version> <pp_fwu_branch_version type=M85>2</pp_fwu_branch_version> <pp_fwu_sw_version type=M25>400</pp_fwu_sw_version> <pp_fwu_branch_version type=M25>2</pp_fwu_branch_version> </firmware-settings>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 1 (idx="1") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!--######### SIP Account 1 #########--> <user_active idx="1">%%ext_01_enabled%%</user_active> <user_name idx="1">%%ext_int_num_01%%</user_name> <user_pname idx="1">%%ext_auth_id_01%%</user_pname> <user_pass idx="1">%%ext_auth_pw_01%%</user_pass> <user_mailbox idx="1">%%vm_number%%</user_mailbox> <user_mailnumber idx="1">%%vm_number%%</user_mailnumber> <user_realname idx="1">%%ext_last_name_01%%</user_realname>
<!--######### Handset 1 #########-->
<subscr_sip_hs_idx idx="1">1</subscr_sip_hs_idx> <subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id idx="1">1</subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id> <subscr_sip_line_name idx="1">Line1</subscr_sip_line_name> <subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs idx="1">1</subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs>
<!--######### Other 1 #########--> <call_waiting idx="1">on</call_waiting>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 2 (idx="2") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!--######### SIP Account 2 #########--> <user_active idx="2">%%ext_02_enabled%%</user_active> <user_name idx="2">%%ext_int_num_02%%</user_name> <user_pname idx="2">%%ext_auth_id_02%%</user_pname> <user_pass idx="2">%%ext_auth_pw_02%%</user_pass> <user_mailbox idx="2">%%vm_number%%</user_mailbox> <user_mailnumber idx="2">%%vm_number%%</user_mailnumber> <user_realname idx="2">%%ext_last_name_02%%</user_realname>
<!--######### Handset 2 #########-->
<subscr_sip_hs_idx idx="2">2</subscr_sip_hs_idx> <subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id idx="2">1</subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id> <subscr_sip_line_name idx="2">Line1</subscr_sip_line_name> <subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs idx="2">2</subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs>
<!--######### Other 2 #########--> <call_waiting idx="2">on</call_waiting>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 3 (idx="3") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!--######### SIP Account 3 #########--> <user_active idx="3">%%ext_03_enabled%%</user_active> <user_name idx="3">%%ext_int_num_03%%</user_name> <user_pname idx="3">%%ext_auth_id_03%%</user_pname> <user_pass idx="3">%%ext_auth_pw_03%%</user_pass> <user_mailbox idx="3">%%vm_number%%</user_mailbox> <user_mailnumber idx="3">%%vm_number%%</user_mailnumber> <user_realname idx="3">%%ext_last_name_03%%</user_realname>
<!--######### Handset 3 #########-->
<subscr_sip_hs_idx idx="3">3</subscr_sip_hs_idx> <subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id idx="3">1</subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id> <subscr_sip_line_name idx="3">Line1</subscr_sip_line_name> <subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs idx="3">4</subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs>
<!--######### Other 3 #########--> <call_waiting idx="3">on</call_waiting>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 4 (idx="4") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!--######### SIP Account 4 #########--> <user_active idx="4">%%ext_04_enabled%%</user_active> <user_name idx="4">%%ext_int_num_04%%</user_name> <user_pname idx="4">%%ext_auth_id_04%%</user_pname> <user_pass idx="4">%%ext_auth_pw_04%%</user_pass> <user_mailbox idx="4">%%vm_number%%</user_mailbox> <user_mailnumber idx="4">%%vm_number%%</user_mailnumber> <user_realname idx="4">%%ext_last_name_04%%</user_realname>
<!--######### Handset 4 #########-->
<subscr_sip_hs_idx idx="4">4</subscr_sip_hs_idx> <subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id idx="4">1</subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id> <subscr_sip_line_name idx="4">Line1</subscr_sip_line_name> <subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs idx="4">8</subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs>
<!--######### Other 4 #########--> <call_waiting idx="4">on</call_waiting>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 5 (idx="5") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!--######### SIP Account 5 #########--> <user_active idx="5">%%ext_05_enabled%%</user_active> <user_name idx="5">%%ext_int_num_05%%</user_name> <user_pname idx="5">%%ext_auth_id_05%%</user_pname> <user_pass idx="5">%%ext_auth_pw_05%%</user_pass> <user_mailbox idx="5">%%vm_number%%</user_mailbox> <user_mailnumber idx="5">%%vm_number%%</user_mailnumber> <user_realname idx="5">%%ext_last_name_05%%</user_realname>
<!--######### Handset 5 #########-->
<subscr_sip_hs_idx idx="5">5</subscr_sip_hs_idx> <subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id idx="5">1</subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id> <subscr_sip_line_name idx="5">Line1</subscr_sip_line_name> <subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs idx="5">16</subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs>
<!--######### Other 5 #########--> <call_waiting idx="5">on</call_waiting>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 6 (idx="6") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!--######### SIP Account 6 #########--> <user_active idx="6">%%ext_06_enabled%%</user_active> <user_name idx="6">%%ext_int_num_06%%</user_name> <user_pname idx="6">%%ext_auth_id_06%%</user_pname> <user_pass idx="6">%%ext_auth_pw_06%%</user_pass> <user_mailbox idx="6">%%vm_number%%</user_mailbox> <user_mailnumber idx="6">%%vm_number%%</user_mailnumber> <user_realname idx="6">%%ext_last_name_06%%</user_realname>
<!--######### Handset 6 #########-->
<subscr_sip_hs_idx idx="6">6</subscr_sip_hs_idx> <subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id idx="6">1</subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id> <subscr_sip_line_name idx="6">Line1</subscr_sip_line_name> <subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs idx="6">32</subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs>
<!--######### Other 6 #########--> <call_waiting idx="6">on</call_waiting>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 7 (idx="7") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!--######### SIP Account 7 #########--> <user_active idx="7">%%ext_07_enabled%%</user_active> <user_name idx="7">%%ext_int_num_07%%</user_name> <user_pname idx="7">%%ext_auth_id_07%%</user_pname> <user_pass idx="7">%%ext_auth_pw_07%%</user_pass> <user_mailbox idx="7">%%vm_number%%</user_mailbox> <user_mailnumber idx="7">%%vm_number%%</user_mailnumber> <user_realname idx="7">%%ext_last_name_07%%</user_realname>
<!--######### Handset 7 #########-->
<subscr_sip_hs_idx idx="7">7</subscr_sip_hs_idx> <subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id idx="7">1</subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id> <subscr_sip_line_name idx="7">Line1</subscr_sip_line_name> <subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs idx="7">64</subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs>
<!--######### Other 7 #########--> <call_waiting idx="7">on</call_waiting>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 8 (idx="8") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!--######### SIP Account 8 #########--> <user_active idx="8">%%ext_08_enabled%%</user_active> <user_name idx="8">%%ext_int_num_08%%</user_name> <user_pname idx="8">%%ext_auth_id_08%%</user_pname> <user_pass idx="8">%%ext_auth_pw_08%%</user_pass> <user_mailbox idx="8">%%vm_number%%</user_mailbox> <user_mailnumber idx="8">%%vm_number%%</user_mailnumber> <user_realname idx="8">%%ext_last_name_08%%</user_realname>
<!--######### Handset 8 #########-->
<subscr_sip_hs_idx idx="8">8</subscr_sip_hs_idx> <subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id idx="8">1</subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id> <subscr_sip_line_name idx="8">Line1</subscr_sip_line_name> <subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs idx="8">128</subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs>
<!--######### Other 8 #########--> <call_waiting idx="8">on</call_waiting>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 9 (idx="9") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!--######### SIP Account 9 #########--> <user_active idx="9">%%ext_09_enabled%%</user_active> <user_name idx="9">%%ext_int_num_09%%</user_name> <user_pname idx="9">%%ext_auth_id_09%%</user_pname> <user_pass idx="9">%%ext_auth_pw_09%%</user_pass> <user_mailbox idx="9">%%vm_number%%</user_mailbox> <user_mailnumber idx="9">%%vm_number%%</user_mailnumber> <user_realname idx="9">%%ext_last_name_09%%</user_realname>
<!--######### Handset 9 #########-->
<subscr_sip_hs_idx idx="9">9</subscr_sip_hs_idx> <subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id idx="9">1</subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id> <subscr_sip_line_name idx="9">Line1</subscr_sip_line_name> <subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs idx="9">256</subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs>
<!--######### Other 9 #########--> <call_waiting idx="9">on</call_waiting>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 10 (idx="10") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!--######### SIP Account 10 #########--> <user_active idx="10">%%ext_10_enabled%%</user_active> <user_name idx="10">%%ext_int_num_10%%</user_name> <user_pname idx="10">%%ext_auth_id_10%%</user_pname> <user_pass idx="10">%%ext_auth_pw_10%%</user_pass> <user_mailbox idx="10">%%vm_number%%</user_mailbox> <user_mailnumber idx="10">%%vm_number%%</user_mailnumber> <user_realname idx="10">%%ext_last_name_10%%</user_realname>
<!--######### Handset 10 #########-->
<subscr_sip_hs_idx idx="10">10</subscr_sip_hs_idx> <subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id idx="10">1</subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id> <subscr_sip_line_name idx="10">Line1</subscr_sip_line_name> <subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs idx="10">512</subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs>
<!--######### Other 10 #########--> <call_waiting idx="10">on</call_waiting>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 11 (idx="11") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!--######### SIP Account 11 #########--> <user_active idx="11">%%ext_11_enabled%%</user_active> <user_name idx="11">%%ext_int_num_11%%</user_name> <user_pname idx="11">%%ext_auth_id_11%%</user_pname> <user_pass idx="11">%%ext_auth_pw_11%%</user_pass> <user_mailbox idx="11">%%vm_number%%</user_mailbox> <user_mailnumber idx="11">%%vm_number%%</user_mailnumber> <user_realname idx="11">%%ext_last_name_11%%</user_realname>
<!--######### Handset 11 #########-->
<subscr_sip_hs_idx idx="11">11</subscr_sip_hs_idx> <subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id idx="11">1</subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id> <subscr_sip_line_name idx="11">Line1</subscr_sip_line_name> <subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs idx="11">1024</subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs>
<!--######### Other 11 #########--> <call_waiting idx="11">on</call_waiting>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 12 (idx="12") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!--######### SIP Account 12 #########--> <user_active idx="12">%%ext_12_enabled%%</user_active> <user_name idx="12">%%ext_int_num_12%%</user_name> <user_pname idx="12">%%ext_auth_id_12%%</user_pname> <user_pass idx="12">%%ext_auth_pw_12%%</user_pass> <user_mailbox idx="12">%%vm_number%%</user_mailbox> <user_mailnumber idx="12">%%vm_number%%</user_mailnumber> <user_realname idx="12">%%ext_last_name_12%%</user_realname>
<!--######### Handset 12 #########-->
<subscr_sip_hs_idx idx="12">12</subscr_sip_hs_idx> <subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id idx="12">1</subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id> <subscr_sip_line_name idx="12">Line1</subscr_sip_line_name> <subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs idx="12">2048</subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs>
<!--######### Other 12 #########--> <call_waiting idx="12">on</call_waiting>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 13 (idx="13") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!--######### SIP Account 13 #########--> <user_active idx="13">%%ext_13_enabled%%</user_active> <user_name idx="13">%%ext_int_num_13%%</user_name> <user_pname idx="13">%%ext_auth_id_13%%</user_pname> <user_pass idx="13">%%ext_auth_pw_13%%</user_pass> <user_mailbox idx="13">%%vm_number%%</user_mailbox> <user_mailnumber idx="13">%%vm_number%%</user_mailnumber> <user_realname idx="13">%%ext_last_name_13%%</user_realname>
<!--######### Handset 13 #########-->
<subscr_sip_hs_idx idx="13">13</subscr_sip_hs_idx> <subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id idx="13">1</subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id> <subscr_sip_line_name idx="13">Line1</subscr_sip_line_name> <subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs idx="13">4096</subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs>
<!--######### Other 13 #########--> <call_waiting idx="13">on</call_waiting>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 14 (idx="14") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!--######### SIP Account 14 #########--> <user_active idx="14">%%ext_14_enabled%%</user_active> <user_name idx="14">%%ext_int_num_14%%</user_name> <user_pname idx="14">%%ext_auth_id_14%%</user_pname> <user_pass idx="14">%%ext_auth_pw_14%%</user_pass> <user_mailbox idx="14">%%vm_number%%</user_mailbox> <user_mailnumber idx="14">%%vm_number%%</user_mailnumber> <user_realname idx="14">%%ext_last_name_14%%</user_realname>
<!--######### Handset 14 #########-->
<subscr_sip_hs_idx idx="14">14</subscr_sip_hs_idx> <subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id idx="14">1</subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id> <subscr_sip_line_name idx="14">Line1</subscr_sip_line_name> <subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs idx="14">8192</subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs>
<!--######### Other 14 #########--> <call_waiting idx="14">on</call_waiting>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 15 (idx="15") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!--######### SIP Account 15 #########--> <user_active idx="15">%%ext_15_enabled%%</user_active> <user_name idx="15">%%ext_int_num_15%%</user_name> <user_pname idx="15">%%ext_auth_id_15%%</user_pname> <user_pass idx="15">%%ext_auth_pw_15%%</user_pass> <user_mailbox idx="15">%%vm_number%%</user_mailbox> <user_mailnumber idx="15">%%vm_number%%</user_mailnumber> <user_realname idx="15">%%ext_last_name_15%%</user_realname>
<!--######### Handset 15 #########-->
<subscr_sip_hs_idx idx="15">15</subscr_sip_hs_idx> <subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id idx="15">1</subscr_sip_ua_data_server_id> <subscr_sip_line_name idx="15">Line1</subscr_sip_line_name> <subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs idx="15">16384</subscr_sip_ua_subscribed_hs>
<!--######### Other 15 #########--> <call_waiting idx="15">on</call_waiting>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 16 (idx="16") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
